name: Lim
text:
On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to one card with the [Odyssey] type other than <Lim> and put it in your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
End of Your Turn: If you have 3 or more rested characters in play, set this character as active.
